text: Ranveer Singh Bhavnani, professionally known as Ranveer Singh, is an Indian actor who mainly is known for his work in Hindi movies. He made his acting debut with a leading role in romantic comedy film Band Baaja Baaraat (2010) and for which won Filmfare Award for Best Male Debut. Although he was seen as a lead role in the many commercially successful movies, some of which highest- grossing releases came including Bajirao Mastani (2015), Padmaavat (2018), Simmba (2018), and Gully Boy (2019). In 2021 and 2022, he starred in these three films: Sooryavanshi (2021), 83 (2021), and Jayeshbhai Jordaar (2022) and Cirkus (2022). ==Upcoming films== His next film is Rocky Aur Rani Ki Prem Kahani. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Indian movie actors
title: Ranveer Singh
